item.title: 亚洲股市上涨，很大程度上得益于中国的稳定努力
item.description: Asian stocks firmed on Wednesday as investors waited to see if Beijing's increasingly frantic efforts to prop up its sagging share markets would actually work, while bonds enjoyed a reprieve from recent selling.翻译:亚洲股市周三走强，投资者在观望北京为支撑低迷股市而采取的日益疯狂的举措是否真正有效，而债券则因近期抛售而有所缓解。
item.author: Wayne Cole

item.title: 美元从近三个月高点回调后处于守势
item.description: The dollar remained under pressure on Wednesday after retreating from a nearly three-month high against the euro in the previous session with a decline in U.S. bond yields adding to the drag.翻译:美元兑欧元在前一交易日从近三个月高位回落后，周三仍面临压力，而美国债券收益率下降也加剧了美元的拖累。
item.author: Kevin Buckland

item.title: 中国驻荷兰大使馆表示绝不允许网络攻击
item.description: China would never allow any Chinese entities or individuals to conduct illegal activities such as cyberattacks or use Chinese facilities for such attacks, the Chinese embassy in the Netherlands said in a statement on Wednesday.翻译:中国驻荷兰大使馆周三发表声明称，中方绝不允许任何中国实体和个人进行网络攻击等非法活动，也绝不允许利用中国设施进行此类攻击。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 北京呼吁韩国奉行“积极、客观、友好”的对华政策
item.description: China hopes South Korea will pursue a "positive, objective and friendly" policy towards Beijing, foreign minister Wang Yi said in a phone call with his South Korean counterpart on Tuesday.翻译:外交部长王毅周二在与韩国外长通电话时表示，中国希望韩国奉行“积极、客观、友好”的对华政策。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 亚洲 中国的反弹有腿吗？
item.description: A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.翻译:展望未来一天的亚洲市场。
item.author: Jamie McGeever

item.title: 美国参议院确认亚洲事务主管库尔特·坎贝尔 (Kurt Campbell) 担任该国第二号外交官
item.description: The U.S. Senate voted overwhelmingly on Tuesday to approve veteran Asia hand Kurt Campbell, a top national security aide to President Joe Biden, as deputy secretary of state, the No. 2 position at the State Department.翻译:美国参议院周二以压倒性多数票批准总统乔·拜登的高级国家安全助理、资深亚洲事务专家库尔特·坎贝尔担任副国务卿，这是国务院的二号人物。
item.author: Patricia Zengerle

item.title: 周计划在 F1 中度过一个更具侵略性的第三个赛季
item.description: Guanyu Zhou is planning a more aggressive approach to his third season in Formula One with the Sauber-run team now known as Stake.翻译:周冠宇正计划与索伯运营的车队（现称为 Stake）以更积极的方式迎接他在一级方程式赛车的第三个赛季。
item.author: Alan Baldwin

item.title: 美国贸易委员会取消对进口食品罐头钢征收倾销税
item.description: The U.S. International Trade Commission on Tuesday voted to strike down anti-dumping duties on tin mill steel used in food cans from Canada, China, Germany and South Korea, finding that these imports do not injure domestic steelmakers.翻译:美国国际贸易委员会周二投票决定取消对来自加拿大、中国、德国和韩国的用于食品罐的锡厂钢材征收的反倾销税，认为这些进口产品不会损害国内钢铁制造商的利益。
item.author: David Lawder

item.title: 中国潜伏之际，美国与萨尔瓦多总统布克莱重修旧好
item.description: When El Salvador President Nayib Bukele published a private WhatsApp conversation with the top U.S. diplomat in the Central American country two years ago, he was sending a message of his own: I will not take orders from the United States.翻译:两年前，萨尔瓦多总统纳伊布·布克莱（Nayib Bukele）在 WhatsApp 上发布了与美国驻这个中美洲国家最高外交官的私人对话，他传达了自己的信息：我不会听从美国的命令。
item.author: Diego Oré, Sarah Kinosian, Nelson Renteria

item.title: 中国间谍去年入侵了荷兰国防网络——情报机构
item.description: Chinese state-backed cyber spies gained access to a Dutch military network last year, Dutch intelligence agencies said on Tuesday, calling it part of a trend of Chinese political espionage against the Netherlands and its allies.翻译:荷兰情报机构周二表示，中国国家支持的网络间谍去年进入了荷兰军事网络，称这是中国针对荷兰及其盟国进行政治间谍活动的一部分。
item.author: James Pearson, Anthony Deutsch

item.title: 中国在北京会谈中向美国表达了对关税和制裁的担忧
item.description: China's financial officials expressed concerns to visiting U.S. Treasury officials about U.S. tariffs, investment restrictions and sanctions set up to "suppress" Chinese companies, the Chinese finance ministry said on Tuesday.翻译:中国财政部周二表示，中国金融官员向来访的美国财政部官员表达了对美国为“打压”中国企业而实施的关税、投资限制和制裁的担忧。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 由于太阳能行业陷入危机，欧洲因中国进口陷入困境
item.description: Europe's green energy transition is stuck between a rock and a hard place. A flood of cheap Chinese solar panel imports is driving record solar energy installations. But those same imports are crushing Europe's few local solar manufacturers.翻译:欧洲的绿色能源转型陷入进退两难的境地。大量廉价的中国太阳能电池板进口正在推动太阳能安装量创历史新高。但同样的进口正在压垮欧洲为数不多的本地太阳能制造商。
item.author: Kate Abnett, Nina Chestney

item.title: 独家：俄罗斯诺瓦泰克公司在中国设立办事处，在制裁期间销售天然气--消息人士
item.description: Russian natural gas producer Novatek is building a new China-based team to explore marketing the fuel, sources familiar with the plans said, as U.S. sanctions thwart plans for exports from its new multi-billion dollar Arctic project.翻译:据知情人士透露，俄罗斯天然气生产商诺瓦泰克正在组建一个新的中国团队，以探索该燃料的营销，因为美国的制裁阻碍了其价值数十亿美元的新北极项目的出口计划。
item.author: Chen Aizhu, Vladimir Soldatkin

item.title: 大众奥迪因零部件短缺削减布鲁塞尔工厂产量
item.description: Volkswagen's luxury car brand Audi has reduced output at its Brussels plant, where it produces the Q8 e-tron model, for at least two weeks due to component shortages, a spokesperson said on Tuesday.翻译:大众汽车旗下豪华汽车品牌奥迪发言人周二表示，由于零部件短缺，该公司生产 Q8 e-tron 车型的布鲁塞尔工厂已减产至少两周。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国交易所限制部分对冲基金抛售股票
item.description: China's stock exchanges are restricting share selling by some hedge funds, four fund managers and a broker said, in the latest attempt to stabilise a market that has slumped to five-year lows.翻译:四位基金经理和一位经纪人表示，中国证券交易所正在限制一些对冲基金的股票出售，这是稳定跌至五年低点的市场的最新尝试。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国海警船进入东海争议海域
item.description: China's Coast Guard said it patrolled the waters of the Diaoyu Islands on Tuesday - territories in the East China Sea that are claimed by China, Japan and Taiwan.翻译:中国海警表示，周二在钓鱼岛海域进行了巡逻。钓鱼岛是中国、日本和台湾都声称拥有主权的东海领土。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 工作忧虑让中国人回家度假心情不好
item.description: Chinese workers packed into trains on Monday, heading home for the Lunar New Year holidays with worries about their jobs and a stuttering economy overshadowing the build-up to the long-awaited family reunions.翻译:周一，中国工人们挤上火车回家过农历新年假期，他们对工作和经济不景气的担忧给人们期待已久的家庭团聚蒙上了阴影。
item.author: Nicoco Chan, Samuel Shen

item.title: 杨恒均：这句话对中澳关系意味着什么
item.description: The suspended death sentence handed to Australian writer Yang Hengjun in Beijing on Monday is unlikely to derail Australia-China ties but will test the limits of Canberra's push to put relations back on track after years of tensions, analysts say.翻译:分析人士表示，澳大利亚作家杨恒均周一在北京被判处死刑缓期执行，这不太可能破坏澳中关系，但将考验堪培拉在多年紧张关系后推动两国关系重回正轨的努力的极限。
item.author: Laurie Chen

item.title: 独家：随着股市暴跌，中国券商限制跨境互换--消息人士
item.description: Chinese brokerages, including state-owned behemoth China International Capital Corp (CICC), have restricted the amount of cross-border swap transactions domestic investors can undertake, as authorities seek to defend the weak stock market, according to six sources familiar with the matter.翻译:据六位知情人士透露，为了捍卫疲软的股市，包括国有巨头中国国际金融公司（中金公司）在内的中国券商限制了国内投资者可以进行的跨境掉期交易金额。
item.author: Summer Zhen

item.title: 中国价格暴跌将一些出口商推向崩溃的边缘
item.description: Prolonged factory deflation is threatening the survival of smaller Chinese exporters.翻译:长期的工厂通缩正在威胁中国小型出口商的生存。
item.author: Ellen Zhang, Marius Zaharia
